sources.title: Burn 'Em Up Barnes (1934) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Jack Mulhall, Lola Lane, Frankie Darro
Directors: Colbert Clark & Armand Schaefer

Hold on to your hats and fasten your seat belts for a "thrill-inspiring" Cliffhanger from Nat Levine‚Äôs Mascot Pictures. Daredevil race car driver Burn 'em-Up Barnes and perennial damsel in distress Marjorie Temple team up to run her late father‚Äôs transportation company. Edwin Maxwell and Jason Robards Sr. shine as a pair of respectable crooks out to sabotage their business. 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00          PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:52         CHAPTER 1:  King of the Dirt Tracks
31:12       CHAPTER 2:  The Newsreel Murder
50:42       CHAPTER 3:  The Phantom Witness
1:09:34    CHAPTER 4:  The Celluloid Clue
1:26:37    CHAPTER 5:  The Decoy Driver
1:46:40    CHAPTER 6:  Crimson Alibi
2:05:37    CHAPTER 7:  Roaring Rails   
2:21:07    CHAPTER 8:  Death Crash 
2:41:09    CHAPTER 9:  The Man Higher Up 
2:59:37    CHAPTER 10:  The Missing Link 
3:18:14    CHAPTER 11:  Surrounded 
3:37:40    CHAPTER 12:  The Fatal Whisper
3:53:39    Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Marjorie Temple, owner of a bus line and an apparently worthless plot of land, is set upon by rich oil speculators who know her land actually is worth millions. When they try to put her out of business for good, young race driver Burn 'em Up Barnes comes to her rescue - again and again and again.
metadata.Writer: John Rathmell, Colbert Clark, Al Martin
metadata.Actors: Jack Mulhall, Frankie Darro, Lola Lane
